name: places/ChIJvW5XNU5YwokRU2kWWx74JKs
adrFormatAddress: 679 11th Ave, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: My visit at this dealer was excellent. George was straight forward, answered all my questions and concerns. Afterwards, spoke to Freddy the finance manager. Awesome experience, I believe he went above and beyond customer service. They have gained a life-long customer, I will refer all my family and friends to them.

text.text: My visit at this dealer was excellent. George was straight forward, answered all my questions and concerns. Afterwards, spoke to Freddy the finance manager. Awesome experience, I believe he went above and beyond customer service. They have gained a life-long customer, I will refer all my family and friends to them.

originalText.text: My daughter and son in laws lease on their RAV 4 was up in a week. They loved it but felt it was time to maybe go a little bigger.  I went with them to Toyota of Manhattan to look at a Highlander.  We were greeted personally by Greg, the General Manager. He in turn had Kevin show them a few different models and then take them out for a couple of test drives down the West Side Highway!  Kevin could not have been any more friendly and professional. Long story short, they are now the very happy family owners of a 2024 Toyota Highlander Sport!  This is not your typical car dealership. Zero pressure and smiling faces on everyone! See Greg and his team if considering a Toyota. A real class act and at a very reasonable price. And btw…. The place is gorgeous with a fantastic NYC view!  And if it’s a Lexus you’re after you will also be in the right place. Lexus of Manhattan is at the same location!

originalText.text:
I leased a new RAV4 from Toyota of Manhattan & my wife renewed her private, personal car service, namely me!
IMHO the entire Toyota staff (especially Tatiana & Freddy) checked all the boxes: friendliness, patience - helping us connect our phones to the car - professionalism & honesty.
The epitome of Omotenashi.
Keep up the good work people!
Domo arigato Toyota.
PS: A “While you wait Sushi Bar” would be a nice touch.  Just sayin’.

originalText.text: Not very happy with service. Took my car for oil change, after 3 hours was told service is done and car is out for cleaning,  which is great, right? After 4 hours car comes back and they couldn't clean it because this is a Taxi and has a top LED display. Apparently, someone didn't see the topper, hahaha very funny, right? Well! Seems that the car still displays that oil maintenance required. We all can justify that when getting old in bussiness can lead to forgetting some of the little stuff, which is understandable. Some newbie companies have been doing a great job, seriously good luck.

originalText.text: Service Center Richie Lopez was a helpful person. He was doing his job very efficiently and sufficient with his job. I love the way he was taken care of my vehicle. He's very responsible and alert to his job.Thank You
